name: Mist Ball
description: You fire an explosive ball of damaging mist at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack against a target, doing 5d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is higher than 10, the target has disadvantage on any attack it makes before the end of its next turn..
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: Badly startles all Pokemon that successfully showed their appeal.
